statements: SELECT feedback_id, citizen_name, government_official, feedback_message, date_submitted FROM feedback_table ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE citizen_name = 'Alice'
SELECT feedback_id, citizen_name, government_official FROM feedback_table WHERE government_official = 'John Doe' ORDER BY feedback_id
SELECT citizen_name, feedback_message FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_id = 3
SELECT * FROM feedback_table ORDER BY government_official ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback_table ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT citizen_name, government_official, feedback_message FROM feedback_table WHERE government_official = 'John Doe' AND date_submitted > '2022-06-01'
SELECT government_official, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_table GROUP BY government_official ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT feedback_id, citizen_name, government_official, feedback_message FROM feedback_table WHERE citizen_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT feedback_id, citizen_name, feedback_message FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_message LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT feedback_id, citizen_name, feedback_text, submission_date FROM citizen_feedback;
SELECT citizen_name, submission_date, feedback_text, feedback_id FROM citizen_feedback;
SELECT official_id, official_name, department, office_address FROM government_officials;
SELECT official_name, department, office_address, official_id FROM government_officials;
SELECT * FROM citizen_feedback WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM citizen_feedback WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT citizen_name, feedback_text FROM citizen_feedback WHERE feedback_id <> 5;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM government_officials;
SELECT * FROM citizen_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%complaint%';
SELECT citizen_name, department FROM citizen_feedback cf JOIN government_officials go ON cf.feedback_id = go.official_id ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM citizen_feedback;
SELECT citizen_name, feedback_text FROM citizen_feedback;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE official_id = 1;
SELECT submission_date, citizen_name FROM citizen_feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT official_name, department FROM government_officials WHERE department = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM citizen_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT citizen_name, feedback_text FROM citizen_feedback WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT official_name, department, email FROM government_officials WHERE official_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_text, official_name FROM complaints JOIN government_officials ON complaints.official_id = government_officials.official_id;
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Citizens WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT citizen_id, first_name, last_name FROM Citizens ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT complaint_content, complaint_date FROM Complaints WHERE resolved = TRUE ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Citizens LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Citizens ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Feedback WHERE resolved = true;
SELECT * FROM Officials WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department, position FROM Officials WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT name, email FROM Officials WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT description, status FROM Complaints ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT resolution_text FROM Resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM Feedback WHERE citizen_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Citizens WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Complaints WHERE status = 'Pending';

SELECT Citizens.name, Officials.name FROM Citizens JOIN Complaints ON Citizens.citizen_id = Complaints.citizen_id JOIN Resolutions ON Complaints.complaint_id = Resolutions.complaint_id JOIN Officials ON Resolutions.resolved_by = Officials.official_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Officials ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
